attribute.name: description
attribute.value: The Arabidopsis Information Resource

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Genome Annotation (TAIR10)

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: TAIR10 GFF3 file consisting of genes, TE related genes, other non-coding RNA and transposable elements

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Genome Assembly (TAIR9)

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: TAIR9 Genome asssembly in FASTA format, consisting of 5 Chromosomes plus Chloroplast and Mitochondrial genome assemblies

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Coding Sequence (CDS) FASTA (TAIR10)

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: TAIR10 Coding sequences in FASTA format, consisting of sequences from all the annotated transcripts

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: GO Annotation from TAIR

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: GO Annotations made by TAIR curators and TIGR Arabidopsis annotation effort

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Comprehensive, high-quality and freely accessible resource of protein sequence and functional information

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Swiss-Prot data set

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: High-quality, manually annotated, non-redundant protein sequence database

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: TrEMBL data set

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Computationally analysed records, enriched with automatic annotation

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: InterPro domains

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Protein family and domain assignments to proteins

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: GO Annotation from UniProt

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: High quality GO annotations to proteins in UniProtKB

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: GO Annotation from InterPro

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Mapping between InterPro domains and GO terms

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Orthologue and paralogue relationships based on the inferred speciation and gene duplication events in the phylogenetic tree

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: Panther data set

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Panther orthologues from Yeast, Roundworm, Fruit Fly, Zebrafish, Human, Mouse and Rat and paralogues from Arabidopsis

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: The Bio-Analaytic Resource for Plant Biology

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: BAR Interactions data set

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Confirmed Arabidopsis interaction proteins from several sources (BIND, MIND, Popescu, Braun, Frommer, etc.) compiled by BAR

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: BAR Annotations Lookup

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Mapping between an AGI and Probeset

attribute.name: description

attribute.name: name
attribute.value: PubMed to gene mapping

attribute.name: description
